Scripts for plotting [http://www.mohid.com MOHID] netcdf files in matlab.

Prerequisites are [http://www.matlab.com Matlab] version 6.5 or greater, [http://mexcdf.sourceforge.net/ mexnc], and [http://www.eos.ubc.ca/~rich/map.html m_map].

Here's a summarized [http://code.google.com/p/mohidnetcdf/wiki/UsersGuide user's guide].

Here's the [http://code.google.com/p/mohidnetcdf/wiki/DeveloppersHandbook developper handbook].
